item.description: We can talk about upcoming meetings, events, activities, topics, etc. Enjoy conscientious good company, coffees/teas/bagels/etc., and 10% any non-sale book purchase for our group only. Please print and bring your Sustainability meetup group e-mail with you for discount. Discount only applies for the evening of this meeting, 5/18.
item.how_to_find_us: See my photo on our member page, and I'll try to greet everyone when they walk in the door :-)
item.name: Meet 'n' Greet Social Hour
